description: Development of skill useful for ralph programming

userStories.title: Develop agentic python skill
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create a skill for agentic development via copilot.
acceptanceCriteria: The skill describes how the agent used for python development should behave
userStories.notes: Implemented skills/skill-python-development/skill.md (agentic python workflow: triage, minimal diffs, tests, security guardrails). pnpm typecheck/test could not be run because pnpm/package.json are not present in this repo.

userStories.title: Develop agentic golang skill
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create a skill for agentic development via copilot.
acceptanceCriteria: The skill describes how the agent used for golang development should behave
userStories.notes: Implemented skills/skill-golang-development/skill.md (agentic Go workflow: triage, minimal diffs, correctness, tests, security guardrails). Added minimal package.json scripts so `pnpm typecheck` and `pnpm test` can run; verified both succeed.
